title: ImportError: cannot import name 'YamlLoader'
body_html:
Build error:

File "~/pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py", line 15, in <module>
    from yaml import YamlLoader
ImportError: cannot import name 'YamlLoader'

According to PyYAMLDocumentation, the pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py should be modified as:

try:
    # use faster C loader if available
    from yaml import CLoader as YamlLoader
except ImportError:
-   from yaml import YamlLoader
+   from yaml import Loader as YamlLoader

body:
Build error:
```
File "~/pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py", line 15, in <module>
    from yaml import YamlLoader
ImportError: cannot import name 'YamlLoader'
```

According to [PyYAMLDocumentation](https://pyyaml.org/wiki/PyYAMLDocumentation), the `pytorch/tools/autograd/utils.py` should be modified as:
``` diff
try:
    # use faster C loader if available
    from yaml import CLoader as YamlLoader
except ImportError:
-   from yaml import YamlLoader
+   from yaml import Loader as YamlLoader
```
